Jan. 28, 2018 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (First Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (First Section) 5 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-first-section
Brass Metamorphosis
Guild Hall (Grand Hall), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Test piece can be Brass Metamorphosis or Renaissance (Peter Graham). All bands chose Brass Metamorphosis. Best Soloist: Flugel, Johnstone Best Soprano Cornet: Oldham (Lees) Best Bass Section: Boarshurst Silver
Sept. 23, 2017, 11:09 a.m. Feb. 13, 2018, 5:31 p.m.
1 Oldham (Lees) Band John Collins
2 Boarshurst Silver Band James Garlick
3 Johnstone Band Martyn Ramsay
4 Lindley Band Rob Westacott
5 Blackburn and Darwen Band Tariq Ahmed
6 Haslingden & Helmshore Band Simon Cowen
